rules.description: Map Tab to Fn, or Tab if pressed alone
MacBook numeric keypad, FN+JKL; to 123- etc.
Change right option to SHyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)
Change right command to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option)
Change left fn to Super (i.e., shift+command+control)
Map Left Arrow to Ctrl+Shift, or Left Arrow if pressed alone
Map Left  Ctrl to Ctrl, or Escape if pressed alone
Map Enter to Ctrl, or Enter if pressed alone
Map Shift to Shift, or Parenthesis if pressed alone

manipulators.description: [Bear] Use control+d to toggle todo state
[Bear] Use command+v to paste as plain text

rules.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down/up to move current line(s) down/up

manipulators.description: [Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) down
[Bear] Use control+command+down to move current line(s) up
[Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes

rules.description: caps_lock to esc, to ctrl as modifier
return_enter to return_enter, to ctrl as modifier
left_shift to paranthesis, or left_shift as modifier
right_shift to paranthesis, or right_shift as modifier

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: prevpane"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: prevpane"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: nextpane"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: nextpane"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: sidebar"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "outlook: sidebar"'

rules.description: Press f9 twice to enter num-mode, press f9 once to leave it
Press fn twice to enter hyper-mode, press fn once to leave it
grave_accent_and_tilde to map number row to function keys

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "mouse: centre"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "mouse: centre"'

rules.description: Window Mode - Move and Resize Windows

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: left"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: right"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: top"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: bottom"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: full"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: next"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: prev"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: winclose"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "rectangle: kill"'
